org.geysermc.connector.network.translators.item

Class RecipeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.geysermc.connector.network.translators.item.RecipeRegistry

  • public class RecipeRegistry
extends Object
    Manages any recipe-related storing

    • Field Detail

      • LAST_RECIPE_NET_ID

        public static int LAST_RECIPE_NET_ID
        Stores the last used recipe network ID. Since 1.16.200 (and for server-authoritative inventories), each recipe needs a unique network ID (or else in .200 the client crashes).

      • ALL_CRAFTING_RECIPES

        public static final it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.Int2ObjectMap<com.github.steveice10.mc.protocol.data.game.recipe.Recipe> ALL_CRAFTING_RECIPES
        A list of all the following crafting recipes, but in a format understood by Java servers. Used for console autocrafting.

      • LEATHER_DYEING_RECIPES

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> LEATHER_DYEING_RECIPES
        A list of all possible leather armor dyeing recipes. Created manually.

      • FIREWORK_ROCKET_RECIPES

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> FIREWORK_ROCKET_RECIPES
        A list of all possible firework rocket recipes, including the base rocket. Obtained from a ProxyPass dump of protocol v407

      • FIREWORK_STAR_RECIPES

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> FIREWORK_STAR_RECIPES
        A list of all possible firework star recipes. Obtained from a ProxyPass dump of protocol v407

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> SHULKER_BOX_DYEING_RECIPES
        A list of all possible shulker box dyeing options. Obtained from a ProxyPass dump of protocol v407

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> SUSPICIOUS_STEW_RECIPES
        A list of all possible suspicious stew recipes. Obtained from a ProxyPass dump of protocol v407

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> TIPPED_ARROW_RECIPES

      • CARTOGRAPHY_RECIPE_DATA

        public static final List<com.nukkitx.protocol.bedrock.data.inventory.CraftingData> CARTOGRAPHY_RECIPE_DATA
        Recipe data that, when sent to the client, enables cartography features. This does not have a Java equivalent.

      • BOOK_CLONING_RECIPE_DATA
